name: Myth Of The Mountain
description:
You awake alone at your camp.  Where is your campmate? 

You must find a way to re-establish communications but something else is out there...are you truly alone?

Myth Of The Mountain is a first-person short, story-driven adventure-horror game set in a snowy mountain range.  You must explore the world and activate all beacons, establish a connection to get help and escape! There is something searching for you in the snow, will it find you? Will you escape? 

Compatible with Windows and macOS.
